name: Decisive Blow [Fated]
desc:
Active when Engaged. When initiating combat, add Mag to physical attacks.
[Fated Bonus] If unit doubles, unit will also attack a third time at half damage.
components: has_skill(unit, 'KwameEngaged') and (combat_calcs.attack_speed(unit, item) - 4 >= combat_calcs.attack_speed(unit2)) and mode == 'attack'
